illidium.sword: Burns targets and have a small chance to replenish 1 durability
solar_disk.launcher: Cost: 20 Mana/shot. Projectile does 5 magic damage and bounces 4 times.
solarforge.veinminer: Crouching while mining an ore will dig up all vein. Manacost: 3.5/Block
solarforge.illidium_hoe: Applies bone meal on targeted block. Manacost: 200/use
solarforge.aura_healer_block: Heals all players in 20 block radius for 2 hearts every 20 seconds if the structure is right
solarforge.totem_of_immortality: Works similar to totem of undying, but applies invulnerability for 20 seconds
solarforge.solar_shield_of_god: Charges when being used and on release damages all units in 5 block radius(if damage >= 7.5 knocks mobs away). The more time you use the shield the more damage it will do(seconds):
solarforge.block_boomerang: Takes a block in offhand slot and places it on collision, then returns to player
solarforge.mana_amulet: Increases mana regeneration by 2 per second
solarforge.ultra_crossbow: When you are using it, the damage increases by 3 per each second. If damage is more than 30 causes an explosion on impact. Manacost:200/shot.
solarforge.qualaium_sword: Has chance to restore 2 durability on hit. Special ability: disarms all nearby entities. Cooldown:30.
solarforge.qualadium_pickaxe: Has a small chance to drop a treasure item
solarforge.illidium_axe: Has a chance to drop a charcoal when harvesting wood
solarforge.qualadium_axe: Has a chance to duplicate the wood that you are harvesting
solarcraft.failure_unlock: You cant unlock this progression or it doesnt exist.
solarcraft.welcome_message: Thanks for downloading SolarCraft! To cheat progression/other you can use /solarcraft commands. If you updated the mod and had a solar lexicon
solarcraft.welcome_message2: please delete it and make a new. Use /solarcraft fragments retain to get all the fragments you had. If you open old lexicon it may cause crash.
solarcraft.gethelpcommand: This codes are used in /solarcraft unlock <code>
solarcraft.solar_wand: Is used to trigger crafting on the Infuser.
solarcraft.turret_desc: Can be upgraded with charged qualadium. Each increases the damage of the turret by 5 (Max level 5).
solarcraft.solar_god_sword_desc: Can be upgraded. Max levels 5. Current level:
solarcraft.solar_god_sword_level_3: Level 3: Can launch a projectile with 5 damage. Cooldown: 10
pre.solar_stone: What is this luminous stone in the caves?
pre.solar_forge_craft: With the power of the solar shards i think i will be able to create that machinery
pre.solar_infuser_create: Solar stone and shards are a good combination...
pre.key_lock_dungeon: A strange magic aura comes from desert.
pre.key_source: Evil savanna caves can bring you only death... Or not only death?
pre.cold_star_piece: There once was a legend about a single piece of a star that can provide an untold riches to whoever found it
pre.cold_star_piece_activated: The star piece is very rare, but useless without charging.
pre.solar_lens_craft: The properties of a charged star piece suggest only one thing.
pre.solar_generator_craft: Solar forge energy cant be used but how to get it in a pure pure form?
solarcraft.solar_god_pickaxe_desc: Can be upgraded. Max levels 4. Current level:
solarcraft.solar_god_pickaxe_level_2: Level 2: Has a chance to drop experience when mining
solarcraft.already_traded: I have already traded with you!
solarcraft.use_villager_success: Deal. Also i need to warn you about a strange structure in the jungle. Those who entered it did not return...
solarcraft.bring_emeralds: Okay i will give you some gems, but for 64 emeralds
solarcraft.not_enough_skill: You are not skilled enough and you dare asking me for help?
pre.find_incinerated_forest: A place where time has stopped...
pre.blue_gem_trade: Villagers have told me about a weird man who lives in mountains.
pre.transmute_gem: This stones that he gave me strangely reacts to lava.
solarforge.radiant_chestplate: When worn, damages ALL mobs around. Provides 17% miss chance.
solarforge.magnet_block: Pulls all items around when powered by redstone. Will try to put items in the inventory below.
runic_table.lore: This table is made of a wood with magical properties, it allows to reveal what has been hidden a long time ago. Can be used to unlock information on unopened fragments.
fragment.lore: Across the world where ancient civilizations lived their notes can still be found. Can be used to acquire hidden information.
lexicon.lore: This book is a "guide" to SolarCraft mod. Collect fragments and put them inside to open new information. If you have lost the book somehow, you can use /solarcraft fragments command to retrieve the lost fragments.
wand.lore: This the main tool in your adventures. Can be used in various situations.
solar_dust.lore: A magical powder that is produced by processing the solar shards in a solar forge. Its properties can be used to create a lot of good items.
energy_dust.lore: A good powder that can be used as a catalyst in most crafts. Can be obtained through Sun-flowers in desert.
solar_forge.lore: A machinery that ancient civilizations used to produce raw solar energy. Gives its owner the power to destroy mountains.
solar_helmet.lore: A good set of armor, better than netherite.
solar_chestplate.lore: A good set of armor, better than netherite.
solar_leggings.lore: A good set of armor, better than netherite.
solar_boots.lore: A good set of armor, better than netherite.
item_magnet.lore: When powered by redstone will pull all item around to itself, if an inventory is present below will try to put items in it.
aura_healer.lore: Will heal all players in a huge radius for 2 hearts every 20 seconds. Requires a structure to function.
disc_launcher.lore: A powerful weapon that shots a disc that does 5 magic damage and bounces between nearby mobs 4 times.
solar_turret.lore: Basic defensive structure that can be upgraded using charged qualadium ingots. Base damage: 5.
mana_regen_amulet.lore: If you need more mana then this could provide you extra 2 mana regen per second while in your inventory(does not stack).
small_solar_reactor.lore: Can be used in some items that doesnt require a lot of solar energy to function.
algadium_ingot.lore: A strong magic material which can be used to craft cores.
block_boomerang.lore: Takes a block in offhand slot and places it on impact, then returns to the owner.
illidium_sword.lore: A sword made of illidium ingots. Sets targets on fire and has a chance to repair itself for 1 durability on each hit.
illidium_axe.lore: An axe made of illidium ingots. Has a chance to drop a charcoal when mining wood.
illidium_shovel.lore: A shovel made of illidium ingots. Just a shovel. Nothing mysterious.
illidium_hoe.lore: A hoe made of illidium ingots. Can be used on crops to apply bonemeal. Cost: 200 mana/use.
illidium_pickaxe.lore: Pickaxe made of illidium ingots. Unbreakable but drains 3.5 mana per block mined. Crouching while mining an ore will dig up all vein.
solar_lens.lore: Multiplies the power of light that pierces through it.
solar_energy_generator.lore: A complex machine that can produce pure solar energy. Requires structure to function.
solar_god_sword.lore: A powerful upgradable sword of the god itself.
solar_god_shield.lore: A shield of the god itself. Unbreakable. Charges when it is being used and then releases a shockwave that damages nearby mobs.
qualadium_sword.lore: An upgraded version of illidium sword. Has a chance to restore 2 durability on hit. Ability: Disarms nearby mobs. Cooldown: 30 seconds
qualadium_axe.lore: An upgraded version of illidium axe. Has a chance to duplicate the wood that is being harvested.
qualadium_shovel.lore: An upgraded version of illidium shovel. Nothing more mysterious.
qualadium_hoe.lore: An upgraded version of illidium hoe. Also applies bonemeal on blocks around.
qualadium_pickaxe.lore: An upgraded version of illidium pickaxe. Has a chance to drop a small treasure item when harvesting blocks.
charged_qualadium_sword.lore: Charged qualadium tools have higher enchantability than their "parents"
charged_qualadium_axe.lore: Charged qualadium tools have higher enchantability than their "parents"
charged_qualadium_shovel.lore: Charged qualadium tools have higher enchantability than their "parents"
charged_qualadium_hoe.lore: Charged qualadium tools have higher enchantability than their "parents"
charged_qualadium_pickaxe.lore: Charged qualadium tools have higher enchantability than their "parents"
qualadium_ingot.lore: A powerful combination of algadium and illidium.
solar_core.lore: Too much solar energy? This is where you can store it! Maximum energy: 1000000. Be careful - all energy is lost when broken. Needs structure to function.
solar_energy_repeater.lore: Can be used to transfer solar energy.
medium_solar_reactor.lore: An upgraded version of the small solar core. Can be used in more advanced crafting.
charged_qualadium_ingot.lore: Qualadium ingots that are imbued with magic are way more useful that normal ones.
solar_mortar.lore: Advanced defensive structure. Launches projectiles on parabola trajectory. Projectile does explosion in a 5 block radius on impact(doesnt affect blocks). Damage: 20 Magic damage
solar_furnace.lore: Uses pure solar energy to smelt items. Smelting time is 2 times lower than in normal furnace.
totem_of_immortality.lore: Works similar to totem of undying but heals you for full health and applies 20 seconds of invulnerability.
solar_crossbow.lore: The true expression of power. When you are using it, increases the damage by 3 per second(120 maximum). Also causes an explosion when damage is higher than 30.
solar_pickaxe_upgrade.lore: Upgrades the solar god pickaxe to the next level.
solar_god_sword_upgrade.lore: Upgrades solar god sword to the next level
ancient_frag.no_tag: Use Runic table to reveal contents.
ancient_frag.has_tag: Shift-click solar lexicon and then put it inside.
solar_infuser.lore: To craft more valuable items a special machine is needed. Needs structure to function. (Craft will not start if associated fragment isnt unlocked)
radiant_cuirass.lore: Damages all mobs around and provides 17% miss chance when worn.
pre.rune_energy_claim: Rune energy from pylons spreads across the land, maybe there is a way to claim it?
pre.rune_energy_deposit: Strange structures scattered around the world.
pre.solar_rune: Rune energy from pylons spreads across the land, maybe there is a way to capture it in something?
pre.enter_nether: Scary and uncontrollable world hides behind purple veil.
solar_god_bow.lore: The bow of the god itself. Can be upgraded to reach its maximum power.
solarcraft.god_bow_upgrade_3: Level 3: Projectile sets targets on fire for 8 seconds.
amulets.lore: Tired of making potions? Or you are just too lazy to brew them? This amulets can solve this problem, while in your inventory they will give you their effect.
pre.runic_energy_repeater: Further crafting requires more powerful ingredients, which means i need something new to combine them with other items.
runic_energy_repeater.lore: The only way to connect the source of runic energy to the consumers. Radius - 25 blocks. Place a rune blocks under it to assign which energy it should transmit.
solar_god_pickaxe.lore: A powerful upgradable pickaxe of the god itself.
solarforge.experience_crystal_lore: When in your inventory, consumes experience orbs instead of giving them to player. Right click to release experience.
solarcraft_sword_autoheal: Module effect: Has a chance to restore 2 durability on hit
solarcraft_sword_aoe_attack: Module effect: Ability - Damages all mobs in small AOE around player for the half of sword damage. Cooldown:5 sec.
solarcraft_magic_damage_bonus_5: Module Effect: Magic damage +5. Incompatible with poisoning blade/fury swipes.
solarcraft_miner_ability_tag: Module Effect: Ability - gives 20 seconds of Haste II. Manacost: 300/use
solarcraft_disarming_thorns: Module Effect: Has a chance to apply 2 seconds of disarm on the attacker.
solarcraft_module_blessed: Module effect: Has a small chance to restore 1 durability each second (only during day).
experience_crystal.lore: When in inventory, consumes the experience orbs to store them. Right click to release kept experience.
amethyst_core.lore: An upgraded version of the small solar core.
modules.lore: Can be attached to the specified items to give them bonuses. Modules can be attached in module station. An item cant have two modules of the same type.
death.attack.solarcraft_stargaze: %s has been reduced to atoms by deadly gaze.
dimension_core.lore: The "key" to the new world. Requires a structure to function.
runic_core.lore: An upgraded version of small solar core
pre.dimension_core: Its time to see what they have been hiding from the world.
gloves_of_reach_active: While in your inventory, increases your reach distance by 2
solarcraft_poisoning_blade: Module Effect: Poisoning blade - poisons targets for 8 seconds. Incompatible with magic damage/fury swipes.
solarcraft_fury_swipes: Module Effect: Fury Swipes - each attack increases the damage you deal to the target by 0.5 (Max +10 dmg). Incompatible with magic damage/poisoning blade.
